= Introduction =

Demonstration of Viewport & LayoutPanel.

Screenshot: http://69.20.122.77:8880/hello-world.jpg

= Details =

Java code:

{{{

import org.mosaic.ui.client.InfoPanel;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.TitledLayoutPanel;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.ToolBar;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.ToolButton;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.Viewport;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BorderLayout;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BorderLayoutData;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BoxLayout;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BoxLayoutData;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.LayoutPanel;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BorderLayout.BorderLayoutRegion;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BoxLayout.Orientation;
import org.mosaic.ui.client.layout.BoxLayoutData.FillStyle;

import com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.Command;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.Window;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Button;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ClickListener;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.MenuBar;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.MenuItem;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.RootPanel;
import com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget;

/**
 * Entry point classes define <code>onModuleLoad()</code>.
 */
public class Main implements EntryPoint {

  private final Command menuCommand = new Command() {
    public void execute() {
      InfoPanel.show(Window.getTitle(), "Thank you for selecting a menu item.");
    }
  };

  private final ClickListener clickListener = new ClickListener() {
    public void onClick(Widget sender) {
      final Button btn = (Button) sender;
      InfoPanel.show(btn.getHTML(), "Stop poking me!");
    }
  };

  private Widget newMenuBar() {
    // Create a menu bar
    final MenuBar menu = new MenuBar();
    menu.setAnimationEnabled(true);

    // Create the file menu
    MenuBar fileMenu = new MenuBar(true);
    fileMenu.setAnimationEnabled(true);
    menu.addItem(new MenuItem("File", fileMenu));
    fileMenu.addItem("New", menuCommand);
    fileMenu.addItem("Open...", menuCommand);
    fileMenu.addItem("Open Location...", menuCommand);
    fileMenu.addSeparator();
    fileMenu.addItem("Quit", menuCommand);

    // Create the file menu
    MenuBar editMenu = new MenuBar(true);
    editMenu.setAnimationEnabled(true);
    menu.addItem(new MenuItem("Edit", editMenu));
    editMenu.addItem("Cut", menuCommand);
    editMenu.addItem("Copy", menuCommand);
    editMenu.addItem("Paste", menuCommand);
    editMenu.addSeparator();
    editMenu.addItem("Preferences", menuCommand);

    // Create the file menu
    MenuBar helpMenu = new MenuBar(true);
    helpMenu.setAnimationEnabled(true);
    menu.addItem(new MenuItem("Help", helpMenu));
    helpMenu.addItem("About", menuCommand);

    return menu;
  }

  private Widget newToolBar() {
    final ToolBar toolBar = new ToolBar();

    ToolButton btn1 = new ToolButton("Push 1");
    btn1.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn1);
    
    ToolButton btn2 = new ToolButton("Push 2");
    btn2.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn2);

    ToolButton btn3 = new ToolButton("Push 3");
    btn3.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn3);

    toolBar.addSeparator();

    ToolButton btn4 = new ToolButton("Push 4");
    btn4.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn4);

    ToolButton btn5 = new ToolButton("Push 5");
    btn5.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn5);

    ToolButton btn6 = new ToolButton("Push 6");
    btn6.addClickListener(clickListener);
    toolBar.add(btn6);

    return toolBar;
  }

  /**
   * This is the entry point method.
   */
  public void onModuleLoad() {
    final Viewport viewport = new Viewport();
    final LayoutPanel content = new LayoutPanel(new BorderLayout());
    content.setPadding(1);
    viewport.add(content);

    LayoutPanel toolBox = new LayoutPanel(new BoxLayout(Orientation.VERTICAL));
    toolBox.setPadding(0);
    toolBox.setWidgetSpacing(0);
    toolBox.add(newMenuBar(), new BoxLayoutData(FillStyle.HORIZONTAL));
    toolBox.add(newToolBar(), new BoxLayoutData(FillStyle.HORIZONTAL));

    content.add(toolBox, new BorderLayoutData(BorderLayoutRegion.NORTH));
    content.add(new TitledLayoutPanel("West"), new BorderLayoutData(
        BorderLayoutRegion.WEST, 200, 100, 300, true));
    content.add(new TitledLayoutPanel("Center"), new BorderLayoutData(true));

    RootPanel.get().add(viewport);
  }

}

}}}

The GWT Module XML should contain:


{{{
<module>

	<!-- Inherit the Mosaic Web Toolkit stuff.                      -->
	<inherits name='org.mosaic.ui.Mosaic' />

	<!-- Inherit the default GWT style sheet.  You can change       -->

	<!-- any one of the following lines.                            -->

	...

</module>
